query:
SELECT 
        ld.lineage_id AS source,
        id.image_id AS target
    FROM 
        lineage_details ld
    JOIN 
        lineage_id_to_image_id ili ON ld.lineage_id = ili.lineage_id
    JOIN 
        image_details id ON ili.image_id = id.image_id
    ORDER BY 
        ld.lineage_id
    LIMIT 10;
